gw.solr

Class GWSolrServerMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.solr.GWSolrServerMgr

  • public final class GWSolrServerMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates access to the SolrServer instances for index documents as defined in solrserver-config.xml

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GWSolrServerMgr() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServer findServer(java.lang.String docType)
      Deprecated. 
      Replaced by findSolrClient(String) which returns a SolrClient instance
      static org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrClient findSolrClient(java.lang.String docType)
      Retrieve a Solr client for the specified document type.
      static void registerServers(java.lang.String docId, java.lang.String[] docTypes)
      Preload the Solr server instance(s) for the specified document types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GWSolrServerMgr

        public GWSolrServerMgr()

    • Method Detail

      • registerServers

        public static void registerServers(java.lang.String docId,
                                   java.lang.String[] docTypes)
                            throws SolrException
        Preload the Solr server instance(s) for the specified document types.
        Parameters:
        docId - the document identifier (for example, claimcontact).
        docTypes - an array of document types in the form gwApp + "_" + docId + "_" + solrSearchStore (for example, cc_claimcontact_active)
        Throws:
        SolrException - if the configuration is missing or invalid, or there is a problem creating the SolrServer implementations requested.

      • findSolrClient

        public static org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrClient findSolrClient(java.lang.String docType)
        Retrieve a Solr client for the specified document type. If not yet registered, it will be created on demand. Use registerServers(String, String[]) to preload servers ahead of time, e.g at server startup.
        Parameters:
        docType - the document type in the form gwApp + "_" + docId + "_" + solrSearchStore (for example, cc_claimcontact_active)
        Returns:
        the SolrClient for this document type or null if there was an error or none is configured.

      • findServer

        @Deprecated
public static org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServer findServer(java.lang.String docType)
        Deprecated. Replaced by findSolrClient(String) which returns a SolrClient instance
        Retrieve a Solr server for the specified document type. If not yet registered, it will be created on demand. Use registerServers(String, String[]) to preload servers ahead of time, e.g at server startup.
        Parameters:
        docType - the document type in the form gwApp + "_" + docId + "_" + solrSearchStore (for example, cc_claimcontact_active)
        Returns:
        the SolrServer for this document type or null if there was an error or none is configured.
